Main Hall.description: The entry hallway to New Horizon's Inc.

East Barracks Northern Hall.description: Long hallway facing north, there are more security personel rooms here.

West Barracks Northern Hall.description: Long hallway facing north, there are more security personel rooms here.

Hallway to Labs 1 and 2.description: The door to the east says 'Lab #2'. The door to the west says 'Lab #1'.

Hallway to Labs 3 and 4.description: The door to the east says 'Lab #4'. The door to the west says 'Lab #3'.

Hallway to Labs 5 and 6.description: The door to the east says 'Lab #6'. The door to the west says 'Lab #5'.

Hallway to Labs 7 and 8.description: The door to the east says 'Lab #8'. The door to the west says 'Lab #7'.

Lab 1.description: Research Lab #1, the room is scattered with broken research equipment.

Lab 2.description: Research Lab #2, the wall is lined with xray results and inspirational pictures of cats.

Lab 3.description: Research Lab #3, the bodies of two researchers sit in the corner.

Lab 4.description: Research Lab #4, this lab is filled with empty glass chambers.

Lab 5.description: Research Lab #5, broken computer terminals line the walls. A giant Richard Stallman poster is on the wall to the west.

Lab 6.description: Research Lab #6, this room is covered wall-to-wall with a sticky green substance...

Lab 7.description: Research Lab #7, this room smells kinda funny...

Lab 8.description: Research Lab #8, did they need 8 research labs?
